citations.narrative:
The water bowl in the Screech owl enclosure had several droppings in it and appears to have not been cleaned or
changed for at least several days. There are no other sources of water in the enclosure. This poses a risk of
contamination to the enclosed birds. Water receptacles for birds must be cleaned and sanitized as often as necessary to
keep them free from contamination.
Corrected by: 7/14/2025

citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
The bank of stainless steel cages in the Infirmary, containing a Barn Owl, had not been adequately cleaned. Additionally,
a morning dove had been housed in the enclosure directly over the owl and dried droppings ran down into the lower cage.
There was cardboard with visibly dried feces and spiderwebs in the enclosures around the owl. Excreta and waste must
be removed from under and around the primary enclosure to reduce disease hazards.
Correct by: 7/18/2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representative.
n

narrative:
3.156 
   
Watering 
The water bowl in the Screech owl enclosure had several droppings in it and appears to have not been cleaned or 
changed for at least several days. There are no other sources of water in the enclosure. This poses a risk of 
contamination to the enclosed birds. Water receptacles for birds must be cleaned and sanitized as often as necessary to 
keep them free from contamination. 
 
Corrected by: 7/14/2025 
3.158(a)(1)  Repeat
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
The bank of stainless steel cages in the Infirmary, containing a Barn Owl, had not been adequately cleaned. Additionally, 
a morning dove had been housed in the enclosure directly over the owl and dried droppings ran down into the lower cage. 
There was cardboard with visibly dried feces and spiderwebs in the enclosures around the owl. Excreta and waste must 
be removed from under and around the primary enclosure to reduce disease hazards.  
Correct by: 7/18/2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representative.
